entries.title: Project Structure and Tech Stack
entries.content: The project `tech-book-club-landing-page` is built using Astro and Tailwind CSS. It has an existing structure including `src/` (with `pages`, `components`, `layouts`, `styles`), `public/`, configuration files (`astro.config.mjs`, `tailwind.config.mjs`), and a `memory-bank/` directory.
